#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define forup(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)

int solve(int *arr, int  n,int x){
    int start = arr[x] - x;
    int ans=0;
    rep(i,n)
        if(arr[i]!=start++)ans++;
    return ans;
}
int main(){
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int arr[n];
        rep(i,n)scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
        int ans = 1e9;
        rep(i,n) ans = min(ans,solve(arr,n,i));
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
}
